about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a second-year Information Systems Engineering student at UTN FRT. My driving force is technical problem-solving and process optimization through software.
about.p2: I specialize in web development and scalable application architecture. My focus is on building clean, efficient code with solid logic based on my engineering background.
